name: Naughty Girl - Image Pack
detailed_description:
The 'Naughty Girl - Image Pack' is a pack with images from the 10 beautifull girls on the game in high resolution.

Each girl has 3 clothes 'levels' and the images come in 4096px X 4096px and 1920px X 1080px, totalizing 60 images!

The Images can be found on the game's folder.
'\Steam\steamapps\common\Naughty Girl\ImagePack'
